title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Adding agentic AI to legacy apps with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore  (MAM345)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 为传统应用添加智能代理 AI (MAM345)
abstract: In this code-first session, we demonstrate how to add agentic AI capabilities and augment a legacy application using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and the Amazon Strands Agents SDK. We will explore how to build AI-powered features for a legacy application without modifying the existing backend code. We will showcase how to leverage existing APIs and Lambda functions as the backbone for your agentic AI experience. You'll learn how to execute code in isolated sandbox environments, ensuring security while accessing internal data sources with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Code Interpreter.
abstract_cn: 在这个代码优先的会话中，我们演示如何使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore和Amazon Strands Agents SDK为传统应用程序添加智能AI功能并进行增强。我们将探索如何在不修改现有后端代码的情况下为传统应用程序构建AI驱动的功能。我们将展示如何利用现有的API和Lambda函数作为智能AI体验的基础架构。您将学习如何在隔离的沙箱环境中执行代码，确保安全性的同时通过Amazon Bedrock AgentCore代码解释器访问内部数据源。
